description: This template deploys a 5-tier base environment with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain. Time to deploy: 20-50 minutes. See https://aka.ms/DTL-5-tier-AD-base for details.
summary: This template deploys a multi-vm base environment on corpnet with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain. Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs. See https://aka.ms/DTL-5-tier-AD-base for details and deployment guidance.
